byline: Amy Scott, David Brancaccio, Jeff Tyler, David Weinberg, Rob Schmitz, Bruce Johnson, Sabri Ben-Achour and Anne Soy
teaser: The king of college rankings is adding a new list to its empire. U.S. News & World Report comes out today with its first ever ranking of online programs for veterans. The Obama administration directly accuses China’s military of cyber spying on U.S. government computer systems. And do some local zoning rules simply preserve neighborhood charm or work to discriminate against outsiders?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 7, 2013

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 7, 2013
